mapper.insert:
select seq_notice.nextval from dual
insert into notice values(#{nno}, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, sysdate, 0, #{norigin}, #{nupload}, #{ncategory}, #{nwriter}, #{nstate}, #{mno})
mapper.update: update notice set ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent} , ncategory=#{ncategory}, nstate=#{nstate} where nno=#{nno}
update notice set ncount = ncount+1 where nno=#{nno}
mapper.select: select n.nno, n.ntitle, n.ncontent, n.ndate, n.ncount, n.norigin, n.nupload, n.ncategory, n.nwriter, n.nstate, m.mno from notice n join member m on n.mno=m.mno order by n.ndate desc
